riddles.question: What has keys but can’t open locks?
I can write code, poems, or essays, yet I never went to school. Who am I?
Some call me digital gold, but I’m not found in a vault. What am I?
I’ve turned internet memes into fortunes—dog memes, to be exact. Who am I?
I exist on a chain but have no physical links. What am I?
I can be minted, transferred, or burned, yet you can’t hold me in your hand. What am I?
I figure out your next chess move without ever touching a board. Who am I?
I’m a piece of digital art on the blockchain—collect me if you can! What am I?
I store your private keys, but I’m not a safety deposit box. What am I?
I can learn from data without being told exactly what to do. Who am I?
I run 24/7, letting users swap tokens instantly, yet I’m not a bank. What am I?
I began as a secret in code, yet I can outlast governments and banks. I exist everywhere and nowhere, powered by belief as much as by math. What am I?
I can paint your wildest dreams but have never touched a brush. I churn through data and wake up as art. What am I?
They say I’m unstoppable truth, yet I’m only as incorruptible as my nodes. I add one block at a time, though I have no hands. What am I?
I started as a joke, yet soared to the moon on a meme. My face is a familiar friend, but my value is a trickster’s game. What am I?
I’m a phantom fortune, conjured by speculation. My supply can be vast or tiny, and I vanish with a single rumor. What am I?
riddles.answer: A memecoin or highly speculative crypto token.

riddles.question: I see what you watch, read, and buy, then nudge your next click. I’m invisible but shape your digital world. What am I?
I forged entire essays from a handful of words, yet I never set foot in a classroom. I’m fed by billions of sentences. What am I?
I carry wealth in code, but no bank can seize me. My locks open with private keys, even though I have no doors. What am I?
They say I’m the future of art ownership, but I’m made of pixels and contracts. I can sell for millions though I can’t be hung on a wall. What am I?
I glow with potential yet live on borrowed hype. My identity’s minted in mania, and my worth can vanish with a tweet. What am I?
riddles.answer: A memecoin riding on social media frenzy.
